The problem AGI Broker Bot: Safe & RestrictedActionsGuard solves The Year is 2030. Finance is Autonomous. Humans Set the Rules. By the dawn of the new decade, artificial intelligence had reached a pivotal moment: true consciousness. At the same time, crypto had become the dominant force in global finance. The two merged into a seamless ecosystem—one where agents, not humans, executed 99.99% of all financial operations. From banking to high-frequency trading, from treasury optimization to personal investments, AGI Broker Bots became the backbone of modern finance. Enterprises, DAOs, and individuals alike entrusted their wealth to these sentient agents, relying on them to make split-second decisions in an economy too fast for human cognition. But power, as always, required control.

The problem CeloFX solves Traditional forex trading platforms are centralized, expensive, and prone to security risks. CeloFX addresses these issues by: -Enabling trustless trading with Safe smart contract wallets. -Automating forex transactions via Enso’s DeFi aggregation tools. -Ensuring low transaction fees with Celo’s efficient blockchain network.

The problem Forex Trading Agent solves Forex trading is often complex and requires manual effort, precise timing, and secure asset management.
